text: 6|111|Va agar mo fariştagonro ʙa sūji onon mefiristodem va [hatto] agar murdagon ʙo onon ʙa suxan meomadand va har cizero dasta-dasta dar ʙaroʙaraşon gird meovardem, [to rostgūii pajomʙarro guvohī dihand], ʙoz ham imon nameovardand, magar in ki Alloh taolo ʙixohad, vale ʙeştaraşon nodonī mekunand
